A

AI - Class in game.util
The class AI holds the methods for determining what move will the computer make.
AI() - Constructor for class game.util.AI
 
aiActionPlacement(JButton[][], int, String, String, int, int) - Static method in class game.util.AI
The method aiActionPlacement is a method that places a marker for computer if the computer is one marker away from winning or if the player is one marker away from winning.
aiCheckHelper(JButton[][], int, String, String, int, int) - Static method in class game.util.AI
The method aiCheckHelper is the main decider when it comes to what the computer will do next.
aiNoActionPlacement(JButton[][], String, int, int) - Static method in class game.util.AI
The method aiNoActionPlacement kicks in when neither computer or player is about to win.

C

clickAction(JButton, String) - Method in class game.util.Window
The method clickAction sets the buttons text to player's marker, disables the button and records the position of the clicked button when the user clicks one of the buttons in the application.
computerTurn(int, String, String, JButton[][], int, int) - Static method in class game.util.AI
The computerTurn method is the main deciding factor in what the computer's next turn will be.

D

defaultPlacement(JButton[][], String) - Static method in class game.util.AI
The defaultPlacement method is used as a failsafe and when the application starts.

F

firstPlacement(JButton[][], String) - Static method in class game.util.AI
The method firstPlacement is only used at the start of the application when the computer hasn't put any markers in the array.

G

game - package game
 
game(int, int) - Method in class game.util.Window
The method game sets the default layout for the application as well as creates all the buttons using a 2d-array.
game.util - package game.util
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class game.TicTacToe
The main method initializes the application and asks from the user the size and how many markers must be next to each other for a win.

S

sizeExceptionHandling() - Static method in class game.TicTacToe
This method handles the exception handling of the given size input.

T

TicTacToe - Class in game
The class TicTacToe contains the main initialization of the application as well as exception handling for user's input
TicTacToe() - Constructor for class game.TicTacToe
 
tieCondition(JButton[][]) - Static method in class game.util.WinChecker
The method tieCondition checks the whole 2d-array for a button that is enabled.

W

WinChecker - Class in game.util
The class WinChecker contains the methods for checking a possible win.
WinChecker() - Constructor for class game.util.WinChecker
 
winCondition(int, JButton[][], String) - Static method in class game.util.WinChecker
The method winCondition is the main method for checking for a win.
Window - Class in game.util
The class Window extends the class JFrame and holds the methods for creating the main look of the application.
Window() - Constructor for class game.util.Window
 
winExceptionHandling(int) - Static method in class game.TicTacToe
This method handles the exception handling of the given winning count input.
